feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
